channel.title: CMS on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in CMS on My New Hugo Site

item.title: So, I made this site...
item.description:
Background

Creating this site was my first experience creating a static website since I first learned to code. There’s not a lot to it (intentionally 😁) but I thought I explain here why I made the decision to use Hugo for my personal site and why I landed on a bare-bones blog format, rather than a portfolio.
